articles.title: EU Set to Halt US Trade Deal Over Trump’s New Tariff Threat - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: European Union lawmakers are poised to halt approval of the EU’s trade deal with the US over President Donald Trump’s vow to impose tariffs on countries that supported Greenland in the face of American threats.
